title: Can't buy champions
body:
I can't buy any champion, I have enough IP, I tried to relog a lot of times but it still doesn't work, the "Unlock" button is turned off and when I click it, it says "Not yet implemented"
I hope I can get help with this asap please
Thank you.

replies.body:
I don' think buying through the profile is enabled yet^^"
You should be able to buy through the store directly though.

If you're seeing a disabled unlock button on the LCU client, we can get around this relatively easily. To get around this, let's have you launch the legacy client and sign in to be sure your store works fine there. After that, you can log back into the LCU client and your store should work again!

Let me know how that works out for you!
